name: Spectral Synergy: Realms Entwined
description:
A few notes:
Clicking start game too quickly often results in a blank screen. (Read the story text or look at the credits)

If you have experienced really bad RNG with mapgen, you can go back to the main menu and start a 'new game', which will put you back at level one with the same party stats. 

There are 6 levels in the game, find the ladder in each level to progress to the next level. 

The game takes roughly one hour to complete, assuming you don't die and have to restart ;)

Instructions:  

Welcome, brave adventurer, to the mystical realm of the Radiant Kingdom and the Shadow Domain. Your journey shall take you through treacherous dungeons, each filled with perilous encounters and mysterious treasures. 

Choose your path wisely, for your actions and decisions shall determine your ultimate destiny. To navigate through the dungeons, use the enchanted keys: QWE ASD. Q and E will allow you to strafe left and right, like a skilled warrior. A and D will guide your turns, helping you change direction with ease.

 When a magical hand symbol emerges, press F or click the on-screen button to interact with objects and unravel the secrets within. As you venture through the five treacherous floors, each with its own unique biome and fearsome monsters, you will find yourself tested at every turn.

 The challenges shall grow ever more formidable, culminating in a final confrontation with the dreaded end boss on the sixth floor. Harness the power of experience and enchanted gear to bolster your strength and resilience. Replenish your vitality at sacred wells or by descending deeper into the dungeon.

 Discover mystical potions that, when consumed, shall grant you permanent enhancements to your abilities. To progress further into the abyss, you must locate the hidden ladder leading to the next level. Seek it out as it emerges from the depths of a mysterious hole in the ground. 

Fear not, for the dungeon's design ensures that a path to the exit always exists. Utilize the magical compass to aid your search and consult the map in the top right corner, where the exit is marked with a foreboding red square. Remember, the bottom of the map corresponds to the north on the compass. Embark on your epic quest, face your destiny, and uncover the truth behind the balance of light and darkness. Good luck, adventurer!

Story: 


Embark on a mystifying journey through the entwined realms of light and darkness, life and death. Assume the roles of two enigmatic characters, each with unique abilities, as they navigate the ever-changing labyrinth of intertwined realities. Unravel the hidden mysteries of their connection, and harness the power of spectral synergy to restore balance to the realms. Are you ready to uncover the secrets of the entwined realms? 

Delve into the haunting and beautiful world of Spectral Synergy, where every decision shapes the fate of two intertwined dimensions. Unleash your inner explorer and embrace the challenge of solving intricate puzzles, overcoming fearsome enemies, and discovering the truth that lies within. Dare to experience the captivating power of Spectral Synergy: Realms Entwined. Start your adventure now! 

In the late Middle Ages, a realm of breathtaking beauty and mystifying darkness exists, where sorcery and primitive powder weaponry are intertwined with everyday life. In this world, two powerful forces govern the balance of nature: the Radiant Kingdom, a land of light and life, and the Shadow Domain, a realm of darkness and death.

 For centuries, these realms have coexisted in a fragile equilibrium, held together by the enigmatic force known as Spectral Synergy. In the depths of the Radiant Kingdom, a sacred temple holds the key to maintaining this balance. However, a nefarious sorcerer, driven by an insatiable lust for power, has managed to shatter the harmony by corrupting the temple's sacred crystal.

 This disruption has plunged the realms into chaos, with the boundaries between light and darkness growing thinner each day. It is within this chaos that our two protagonists emerge: a valiant knight from the Radiant Kingdom, sworn to protect the realm of light, and a ruthless outlaw from the Shadow Domain, a master of deception and primitive firearms.

 Unbeknownst to them, their fates are bound by the spectral synergy that connects the realms, a power they must learn to harness if they are to restore balance to their world. As the sorcerer grows stronger, the heroes must descend into the depths of the corrupted temple, where their ultimate foe awaits, eager to engulf the world in eternal darkness.
